    • Field Detail

      • MAX_SIZE

        public static final int MAX_SIZE
        Maximum size the header can have. It's not specified how much it should be, but this is probably more than enough.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Header

        public Header(java.lang.String messageType,
              java.lang.String version,
              java.lang.String senderId,
              java.lang.String fileId,
              java.lang.String chunkNo,
              java.lang.String replicationDeg)
        Constructor. Receives all the information through the arguments.
        Parameters:
        messageType - type of message
        version - version of the message
        senderId - id of the sender
        fileId - id of the file
        chunkNo - number (id) of the chunk
        replicationDeg - degree of replication of the chunk
